Play
Begin your career | University Park Country Club
At University Park Country Club, we believe in creating a welcoming and inclusive environment for both our members and our employees. Join us and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to excellence in hospitality and service.
Explore Job Opportunities Here
WHO WE ARE | UNIVERSITY PARK
The University Park Country Club is an award-winning semi-private Country Club featuring 27 holes of championship golf, illuminated har-tru tennis courts, a state-of-the-art Fitness Centre, a casual lounge/bar/card room plus a restaurant with 270 seats indoors and 100 seats outdoors.
The Country Club is located within the gates of University Park, a prestigious master planned community found on the border of Manatee and Sarasota Counties in Florida, with more than 1,200 homes within 32 individual neighborhoods with homes ranging in value from $600,000 to $3,000,000.
TAKING CARE OF YOU
At University Park Country Club, we prioritize the well-being and satisfaction of our team members as a cornerstone of our commitment to excellence. We emphasize a healthy work-life balance and provide full-time employees with a comprehensive benefits package that reflects our dedication to supporting their overall well-being and professional growth.
Join us where passion meets purpose,
and every day is an opportunity to grow,
connect, and make a difference.
FULL TIME EMPLOYEE BENEFITS
Comprehensive Health Coverage:
Includes medical, dental, and vision insurance.
Life and Accident Insurance:
Employer-paid and voluntary options available.
401(k) Retirement Savings:
Plan for your future with our retirement savings plan.
Employee Golf Privileges & Discounts:
Enjoy access to our prestigious golf facilities and enjoy special employee discounts at the Pro Shop and more.
Generous Paid Time Off:
Take time to recharge with ample leave benefits.
Networking & Development:
We support giving employees the chance to network and develop professionally through our local Chambers of Commerce, Tourism Bureau, Young Professionals Groups and more.
Current Opportunities
Explore our Full-time and Part-time Opportunities.
Please click “apply now” and complete the requested position form.
University Park Country Club is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
August 22, 2025
Landscape Manager
Landscape Manager - Clubhouse & Fitness Center grounds
Full-Time
University Park Country Club / University Park, FL 34201
Job Summary
We are seeking a hands-on, detail-oriented Landscape Manager to lead the care and presentation of our landscaped areas, ensuring they remain vibrant, healthy, and welcoming year-round.
University Park Country Club is committed to providing first-class experience to our members and guests, with beautifully maintained clubhouse and fitness center grounds that reflect the elegance and standards of our community.
Compensation:
$50,000 Salary contingent upon experience.
Benefits:
Medical, Dental, Vision, 401(k), STD, Employer Paid Life Insurance, Voluntary Life Insurance, Off the Job Accident Insurance, Hospital Indemnity Insurance, Critical Illness Insurance, free golf privileges, and more.
Click
HERE
for more information
How to Apply:
Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter outlining your experience in landscape and horticultural management
APPLY NOW
